node.html:
• Build a web-based application for a diverse array of client and internal projects, mostly handling the back end
  • Work with a variety of different languages, frameworks, and content management systems such as JavaScript, PHP, Vue, Laravel, and WordPress
  • Make analysis and design such as database structure and Entity Relationship Diagram (ERD)
  • Perform testing and maintenance on applications that have been built
  • Create or integrate an API
  • Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, producers, and clients

• Ordering the required items from the supplier
  • Organize and hand over purchase invoices to the Finance Manager
  • Counting stock and doing quality control for the items before entering the warehouse
  • Controlling, recording and sorting up the stock of items entering and leaving the warehouse
  • Make a return to the supplier if there are damaged items
  • Stock opname of warehouse items
  • Monthly control of digital and physical assets
